tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE users (id INT, username VARCHAR(255), password VARCHAR(255), role VARCHAR(50))
CREATE TABLE roles (id INT, role_name VARCHAR(50))
CREATE TABLE permissions (id INT, permission_name VARCHAR(50))
CREATE TABLE role_permissions (role_id INT, permission_id INT)
CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, password VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, role VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE roles (role_id INT PRIMARY KEY, role_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE permissions (permission_id INT PRIMARY KEY, permission_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE user_roles (user_id INT, role_id INT, PRIMARY KEY(user_id, role_id))
CREATE TABLE role_permissions (role_id INT, permission_id INT, PRIMARY KEY(role_id, permission_id))
